update backup_log
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

DOMAIN_NAME = #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT date_sub(max(log_date),interval 1 day) as START_DATE FROM ${backup_log_table}
